title: About Us – Pereg Natural Foods & Spices
text: The Pereg Story Family Owned Since 1906 Our Heritage Family-owned since 1906, Pereg Natural Foods began as a humble spice cart and grew into a global brand. With over a century of expertise, we craft pure, natural spices, grains, and blends—always free from additives, preservatives, and MSG. Our products are OU Kosher, with many Non-GMO, gluten-free, and Whole Grain Council approved. Rooted in tradition, we believe food should bring comfort and connect people to family, culture, and community. Why Pereg? With over 115 years of expertise, Pereg is a third-generation family business dedicated to crafting pure, premium spices and grains. We oversee every step, from sourcing to production, ensuring the highest quality and authenticity in every product. Our all-natural ingredients make it easy to create flavorful, gourmet-inspired dishes, bringing global tastes to your kitchen. Whether you're seasoning, cooking, or baking, Pereg delivers exceptional flavor, tradition, and quality you can trust.
